display_long_description:
# Experience combat in VR like never before


With more than 10 hours of single-player campaign game time and 3 chapters each presenting a different landscape and a ton of unique enemies. You’re bound to learn how to deal with them efficiently, with everything you have at your disposal. 
[media]
[media]
Are you a battle-hardened veteran who loves swords and axes? Or a spell-weaving patron of the arcane arts? Maybe an agile rogue who mastered the way of daggers and bow & arrow? Or you prefer throwing weapons? Well, you can basically throw every weapon in Grimlord.
[media]
[media]
With hundreds of weapon customizations, you can truly craft a unique instrument of killing you can call your own. Combine with our physics-based combat mechanics, you can perform all the weapon techniques in game. Oh, did I mention, if you’re using a claymore, you can even do mordhau.
[media]
[media]
There are more than a dozen bosses to challenge, each with their unique design and backstory. They’re not your typical damage sponges, fights with them are epic battle of wits and agility, brains and brawn.
[media]
[media]
[media]
[media]

# Experience combat in VR like never before


With more than 10 hours of single-player campaign game time and 3 chapters each presenting a different landscape and a ton of unique enemies. You’re bound to learn how to deal with them efficiently, with everything you have at your disposal.

Are you a battle-hardened veteran who loves swords and axes? Or a spell-weaving patron of the arcane arts? Maybe an agile rogue who mastered the way of daggers and bow & arrow? Or you prefer throwing weapons? Well, you can basically throw every weapon in Grimlord.
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39001714_1507974673219564_1452701867122163118_n.mp4?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=Qnm0n8cQ5ckQ7kNvwGqyuBr&_nc_oc=Adm_9nWT05oGMxoW7b_ipioLJ9z_zlOscJZPQmrHZ1F3M2i1XRA788i-SRNoX5SgIF8&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=U1f1Gz4Dm1d3LpmTb4bDzw&oh=00_AfqJhCkzIzePO2Hejixe7VQUfl2Xl93BEdXZfZmAcrVuPg&oe=696FCE78)
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75302218_2068538016921333_8411850603412514976_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=u6DRdf-TOf4Q7kNvwGJvJaP&_nc_oc=Adk9f2Z_NawrMCRJLHVG9W9pOmlHq1E4g4el_XuO3xYkc_r0DkvM1fi0ca2IitI1z6Q&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=U1f1Gz4Dm1d3LpmTb4bDzw&oh=00_AfqebDwP5HmRWKFaTZIRBgGia29qMruMeEm3C_rcqtc8HA&oe=696FD3E4)
With hundreds of weapon customizations, you can truly craft a unique instrument of killing you can call your own. Combine with our physics-based combat mechanics, you can perform all the weapon techniques in game. Oh, did I mention, if you’re using a claymore, you can even do mordhau.
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031422_997444645745145_5320263794737829877_n.mp4?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=A6ynWQJBDX8Q7kNvwFNsUxg&_nc_oc=AdkxUMlPRbYPoeIkphF_RM3pUHALGTPR9l3zkE8Ik3h-owG6pbY4g-Ui5diFn3Moo-o&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=U1f1Gz4Dm1d3LpmTb4bDzw&oh=00_AfqJBMNQj0L-p0OAjyCSL-K8zgmPSt5XL-w-YqN_oDkslg&oe=696FFC4E)

There are more than a dozen bosses to challenge, each with their unique design and backstory. They’re not your typical damage sponges, fights with them are epic battle of wits and agility, brains and brawn.
